summary: A guide to building a calculator agent using LangGraph's Graph API or Functional API, covering tool and model setup, state management, node definition, and agent compilation.

structure.title: Quickstart
structure.summary: A guide to building a calculator agent using LangGraph's Graph API or Functional API, covering tool and model setup, state management, node definition, and agent compilation.

nodes.path: quickstart > Quickstart > 1. Define tools and model
nodes.title: 1. Define tools and model
nodes.summary: Initializes a Claude Sonnet model and defines three arithmetic tools (add, multiply, divide) for the LLM to use.

nodes.title: 2. Define state
nodes.summary: Defines a state dictionary for storing messages and LLM call counts in LangGraph, using Annotated for list appending.

nodes.title: 3. Define model node
nodes.summary: Defines a model node that invokes an LLM to decide on tool usage, including a Python function for LLM calls and tracking.

nodes.title: 4. Define tool node
nodes.summary: Defines a tool node function that invokes specified tools and returns results as ToolMessage objects.

nodes.title: 5. Define end logic
nodes.summary: Defines a conditional edge function to route between tool node and end based on LLM tool calls.

nodes.path: quickstart > Quickstart > 6. Build and compile the agent
nodes.title: 6. Build and compile the agent
nodes.summary: Demonstrates building and compiling a LangGraph agent using StateGraph, adding nodes and edges, and invoking it with a sample query.

nodes.path: quickstart > Quickstart > 1. Define tools and model
nodes.title: 1. Define tools and model
nodes.summary: Initializes a Claude Sonnet model and defines three arithmetic tools (add, multiply, divide) for integration with the LLM.

nodes.title: 2. Define model node
nodes.summary: Defines a model node that invokes an LLM to decide on tool usage, using a task decorator for execution.

nodes.title: 3. Define tool node
nodes.summary: Defines a tool node to call tools and return results using a Python function.

nodes.title: 4. Define agent
nodes.summary: Defines an agent using LangGraph's Functional API with @entrypoint, demonstrating tool calling and control flow within a single function.
